responses: what can I do for you?

patterns: how to go to the hospital?
responses: This hospital is situated at Dhanmondi , Dhaka
You will find our hospital at the 2nd lane of Dhanmondi 32.
You may check the all doctors page link -

patterns: I want to place an appointment
responses: okay, you can see the doctor list and ID , choose the doctor and write your name, adress, phone, email, bloodgroup, gender, age, Date and Time ,please.

patterns: I want to place an appointment for myself
responses: okay , I am processing your request, please write the doctor ID.
Here are the avaiable timings , select one please
Sorry, this timing is already booked. See other booked timings down and write a timing except those.
Appointment placed for you, please report 15 munites earlier that day
